79-1317.Educational telecommunications; commission; establish fees.

The Nebraska Educational Telecommunications Commission, in consultation with users of its telecommunications facilities, networks, and equipment, may establish user fees, penalty fees, or other fees as necessary for and consistent with the efficient and orderly use of its facilities, networks, and equipment.

SourceLaws 1995, LB 89, ยง 2;R.S.Supp.,1995, ยง 79-2103.01;Laws 1996, LB 900, ยง 973;Laws 2014, LB692, ยง 5.
